00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 using System.Xml;
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.APMLHelper
00029 {
00033     public class Head
00034     {
00035         #region Constructors
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039         public Head()
00040         {
00041         }
00042 
00047         public Head(XmlElement Element)
00048         {
00049             if (Element.Name.Equals("head", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00050             {
00051                 foreach (XmlNode Child in Element.ChildNodes)
00052                 {
00053                     try
00054                     {
00055                         if (Child.Name.Equals("title", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00056                         {
00057                             Title = Child.InnerText;
00058                         }
00059                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("userEmail", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00060                         {
00061                             UserEmail = Child.InnerText;
00062                         }
00063                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("generator", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00064                         {
00065                             Generator = Child.InnerText;
00066                         }
00067                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("dateCreated", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00068                         {
00069                             DateCreated = DateTime.Parse(Child.InnerText);
00070                         }
00071                     }
00072                     catch { }
00073                 }
00074             }
00075         }
00076         #endregion
00077 
00078         #region Properties
00079 
00080 
00081 
00082         public string Title
00083         {
00084             get { return _Title; }
00085             set { _Title = value; }
00086         }
00087         private string _Title="";
00088 
00092         public string Generator
00093         {
00094             get { return _Generator; }
00095             set { _Generator = value; }
00096         }
00097         private string _Generator="";
00098 
00102         public string UserEmail
00103         {
00104             get { return _UserEmail; }
00105             set { _UserEmail = value; }
00106         }
00107         private string _UserEmail="";
00108 
00112         public DateTime DateCreated
00113         {
00114             get { return _DateCreated; }
00115             set { _DateCreated = value; }
00116         }
00117         private DateTime _DateCreated=DateTime.Now;
00118         #endregion
00119 
00120         #region Overridden Functions
00121         public override string ToString()
00122         {
00123             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00124             Builder.Append("<Head>");
00125             Builder.Append("<Title>" + Title + "</Title>");
00126             Builder.Append("<Generator>" + Generator + "</Generator>");
00127             Builder.Append("<UserEmail>" + UserEmail + "</UserEmail>");
00128             Builder.Append("<DateCreated>" + DateCreated.ToString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ") + "</DateCreated>");
00129             Builder.Append("</Head>");
00130             return Builder.ToString();
00131         }
00132         #endregion
00133     }
00134 }
